# scTreeMerge

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of scTreeMerge is to obtain a optimal tree by merging hierarchical clustering partitions. It provides provides an ensenmble framework for cell segregation in scRNA-seq data analysis.

## Installation

You can install the development version of scTreeMerge like so:

``` r
devtools::install_github("PEARLNIE/scTreeMerge")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(scTreeMerge)
## basic example code
```
